title: Alexa Skill for Cardano news feeds
description:
2 Cardano Skills for Smartspeaker.

Increase visibility of Cardano in English speaking countries (US, CA, UK, AU, NZ, IN) with news skill.

title: Translator Collaboration Platform
description: We have already many translator-hubs, but rugularly they organize themself and dont collaborate with other hubs, project or Proposers.

title: Exhibit Largest BlockChainEXPO(JP)
description: Only few JP companies recognize Cardano as main BLOCKCHAIN!  At present, it is difficult to adopt CARDANO into the real business world.

title: Cardano Hub Buenos Aires
description: There is no visible Cardano community in Buenos Aires. Argentina suffers from inflation. People lack awareness of Cardano as an option.

title: Stop giveaway scammers
description:
A lot of people get scammed on youtube as also Charles mentioned in his recent video. For example

title: No-Code Hackathons
description: Underutilization of the amazing  creativity and energy of the community do to a totally unnecessary digital divide

title: Influencing Policy for Adoption
description: Governments' and policy makers lack of use-case understanding of blockchain technology results in Country adoption friction

title: Homeless Hub
description: Homeless people have a unique culture, with much to share on key issues like value / contribution; but Cardano hasn't yet engaged with them.

title: Cardano in South L.A.
description: The population of Catalyst lacks diversity and thus is in danger of adopting a dominant world view that oppresses underrepresented folks.

title: Add multilanguage to CNFTHub.io
description: There isnt enough community information being provided in languages other than English

title: Interactive Cardano Ecosystem Map
description: Information about Cardano, how to use it, and the project/tools built on it, is fragmented, unorganized and often delivered with bias.

title: SalmonNation Decentralized Alliance
description: There is a need to educate, train, and connect entrepreneurs, change-makers, and developers in the Salmon Nation bio-region.

title: Coding Challenges
description: Getting a buzz going can be a challenge. Advertising may not create community hubs.

title: Scale up Cardano by JPN Publication
description: Japanese ADA holder have largest class ADA. However only 10% members contribute community and less than 5% member attend Catalyst Voting.

title: Cardano Canvas, Cards & Calculator
description: Hubs needing to run events to develop local Cardano knowledge lack frameworks and tools based on shared global patterns and language.

title: Engage African students on campus
description: African students  are creative.  They could fuel new smart-contract solutions but they don't know about the Cardano ecosystem.

title: YouTube Giveaway Scammers
description: I was hacked days before my Mother's funeral. What I do is for my son's. They attacked my legacy. YouTube scammers have to be stopped.

title: DisCO of Urgency
description: Cardano Community is limited to male-dominated tech sphere / Potential adopters outside tech sphere don't know how to engage with Cardano

title: Community Bond - CRM for SME's
description: Connecting all things local. Empowering local businesses & communities to increase loyalty on a digital platform using virtual coins.

title: ADA giveaway or lottery
description: Everyone may not be able to afford to get ADA in large amounts or at all.

title: BR/US University Hubs!
description: Community hubs need backing from communities. We legitimize the need for blockchain hubs by addressing a problem well-known to city leaders.

title: Cardano Learning Centers
description: In Mexico, many communities lack support an access to the tools and training that can unlock a better future and prepare youth.

title: BLOCKCHAINTRANSLATION.IO
description: Translating block chain content takes time. No vocabulary exist in non European languages. Blockchain translators need ways to commercialise

title: Regional Revitalization JP-Meetup
description: Deindustrialization (high aging, depopulation, shortage of engineers in local areas) is serious problem for developed country Japan

title: Cardano Hub Venezuela
description: Venezuelan crypto adoption is happening. Now is the time to escalate Cardano's presence and bring ADA into the hands of its citizens.

title: 1 Cafe to the World
description: Helping small businesses with improved loyalty, customer engagement and business management expertise.

title: Cardano Vietnam Information Centre
description: A survey on Cardano Vietnam community shows that about 90% do not know or incorrectly answer basic knowledge related to Cardano blockchain

title: Cardano Innovation Hub
description: Since there is no hub for coordination and space for Cardano enthusiasts to collaborate, it is limiting the growth of Cardano in Ethiopia.

title: Cardano Care - Charity Across Conti
description: Centralized Charity and Donation system all around the world are complicated, not reliable, cost a lot (not 100% received), and takes time.

title: AtalaGotchi's Community
description: Scaling up community hubs requires more than business and marketing, it requires cultural collectiveness, fun freedom, and laughter.
